cofh.api.tileentity

Interface ITileInfo


  • public interface ITileInfo
    Implement this interface on Tile Entities which can provide information about themselves.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getTileInfo(java.util.List<IChatComponent> info, ForgeDirection side, EntityPlayer player, boolean debug)
      This function appends information to a list provided to it.

    • Method Detail

      • getTileInfo

        void getTileInfo(java.util.List<IChatComponent> info,
               ForgeDirection side,
               EntityPlayer player,
               boolean debug)
        This function appends information to a list provided to it.
        Parameters:
        info - The list that the information should be appended to.
        side - The side of the block that is being queried.
        player - Player doing the querying - this can be NULL.
        debug - If true, the tile should return "debug" information.
